55.eng-name: The Book of Zuhd and Softening of Hearts

hadiths.text: Iyas b. Salama b. al-Akwa reported that his father reported to him that he heard Allah's Apostle (ﷺ) as saying:A person sneezed in his presence and he said to him: May Allah have mercy upon you. And he then sneezed for the second time and Allah's Messenger (ﷺ) said to him: He is suffering from cold (and no response is necessary)

chapter.eng-name: Saying: "May Allah Have Mercy On You" To One Who Sneezes, And Yawning Is Disliked
